about_the_game:
The planet is dying, a team has been created that has to go underground, in the exile of the machines and hit the core. Only in this way, humanity will be able to survive and we have the mission to do so every day. A classic 2D platform game, in a dystopian and survival future.

This is our future history of planet earth and the evolution of machines.

Artificial intelligence took over all the customs in daily life, apparently for the benefit of all.
But the world powers over the machines and their most radical creators began to consider that human beings were no longer useful in this world.
Economic crises and confrontations between governments were increasingly common. People in cities began to not believe in the automation of everything.

The rebellion of the machines brought wars and disasters all over the planet, but the humans were won over the metallic governments and their factions.
The creators and enemies of the order took refuge under our feet, taking over the entire subsoil network and separating the planet in two.

But an event happened that no one could predict.

The planet began to show signs of weakness, it was dying due to lack of resources.
The subsoil was increasingly metallic, and the cables flooded the pipes with water.
Machines were also a problem underground, but the planet's core was weakening faster and faster. the situation needed to be reversed.

A special group was created in the dominant governments on the surface to try to save the planet.
Soldiers prepared to go down to the plants where the machines and enemy factions of order took refuge, who only wanted to see us disappear.

They would avoid at all costs any action in the core and extinguish life outside.

There was only one way to delay the planet's agony, search for plutonium,
load large quantities and hit the core so that it does not lose power and remains active.
The problem is that the solution is not definitive, and the operation must be performed constantly.

Being a member of this group of heroes, every day the planet needs your help.

Before power or oxygen is lost, you will be urgently evacuated. We cannot afford to lose a member of the special team.

Humanity without machines depends on you. we need you!
Join the team.
Now.

Trial Version.
